direction.raw_text: (V.O.) This... is Berk. The best kept secret this side of, well, anywhere. Granted, it may not look like much, but this wet heap of rock packs more than a few surprises.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hiding nervously between buildings as shadows of passing dragons race by. The group moves as one, receding into a shadowy alley, pushing one sheep out into the light. It's suddenly snatched and carried into the air!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Life here is amazing, just not for the faint of heart. See, where most folks enjoy hobbies like whittling or needlepoint, we Berkians prefer a little something we like to call--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! A wash of VIBRANT COLORS blurs by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: at a dizzying speed. Their RIDERS SWIPE, KICK, and ROLL into one another while they WEAVE neck in neck between the houses, docks, and revamped structures of Berk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! It's like an aerial version of the Monte Carlo race. Spectators ROAR from wooden bleachers, fastened to cliff faces and perched over the sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: now 20 and even larger, rides his gronkle, MEATLUG, who carries the sheep in her claws, until...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: also 20, but every bit as juvenile, and his Monstrous Nightmare, HOOKFANG, steal the sheep from them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 2.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I'm sorry, Fishlegs! Did you want that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snotlout! That's mine! Snotlout FALLS BACK toward RUFFNUT and TUFFNUT, who lag on their two-headed Zippleback, BARF & BELCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here ya go, babe. With a chivalrous grin, Snotlout tosses the sheep to Ruffnut. She SNATCHES it with a sneer and a GRUMBLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did I tell you that you look amazing today? `Cause you do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Barf. It's starting to stink around here. Barf starts to peel off, spewing gas. Tuffnut mocks Snotlout with a mugging grin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nope. Still hates you. Let's blow this place, Belch! Belch ignites the gas, sparking a flashy explosion, and leaving Snotlout behind in the smoke. As they rush past the main bleachers, Ruffnut DROPS her sheep into one of five baskets suspended over a chasm at the lap crossing. Each backboard bears an image of its corresponding dragon. The Barf/Belch basket filled to the brim with sheep. Presiding over the game, STOICK turns to the frenzied crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's nine for the Twins, Astrid lags with three, Fishlegs and Snotlout trail with NONE! Stoick eyes an empty basket at the far end, its backboard painted with an image of Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Hiccup is... nowhere to be found. Hmmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 3.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scared him off with the big talk, didn't ya, Stoick?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Snotlout, still smoldering from the blast, gets
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from behind. ASTRID, rolls in, astride STORMFLY -- spirited and competitive as ever, and beautiful despite herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing, Snotlout?! They're going to win now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's my princess! Whatever she wants, she gets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ruffnut?! Didn't she try to bury you alive?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only for a few hours!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as they peel away, pouring on the speed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Dragons used to be a bit of a problem here. But that was five years ago. Now they've all moved in. And, really, why wouldn't they? The racers chase each other through a sprawling hangar and into a vast cave, teeming with colorfully painted dragon stables. They exit through the far side and circle back through the village, blasting past many of its dragon- friendly additions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) We have custom stables... all-you- can-eat feeding stations... a full service dragon wash... In the village, a baby Gronkle sneezes, accidentally setting one of the Viking houses aflame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Even top-of-the-line fire prevention, if I do say so myself. Astrid rolls her eyes, peels away from the other dragon racers, and yanks open a spout on the overhead network of aqueducts, dousing the flames with a surge of water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 4.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: amused as he watches the racers round the island, searching for sheep. He turns to Gobber and nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's time, Gobber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Righty-ho! (aloud, to the crowd) Last lap!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: sounds. The racers all turn to each other, excited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The black sheep! Come on, Stormfly! We can still win this thing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Barf!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go, Meatlug!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: loads the BLACK SHEEP onto a catapult.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is your big moment. Have a nice flight! He pulls the trigger, LAUNCHING the black sheep into the air. Astrid spots it and steers Stormfly into a steep climb toward it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up, up, up! In a flash, Fishlegs and Meatlug blur past, NABBING the sheep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good job, Meatlug! Fishlegs tosses his captured prize to Ruffnut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here you go, darling. Mine's worth ten!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 5.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! The Black Sheep! Snotlout sighs, frustrated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You guys are fighting for Ruffnut?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm totally winning! Fishlegs hovers up nest to Ruffnut with a starry-eyed smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're winning together! She RAMS BARF into Meatlug, sending Fishlegs into an uncontrolled SPIN. He SLAMS into Snotlout, sending their dragons TUMBLING head over tail. The crowd goes wild.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one can stop me now!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Except for me. We're attached, genius! He GRABS at the sheep. Ruffnut fights back, inciting a tug-of- war.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quit trying to steal all my glory! And while they're distracted, Astrid steers Stormfly toward them, CLOSING IN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get `em, Astrid!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's MY glory! No sheep, no You're always ruining glory! EVERYTHING! Astrid leaps off of Stormfly, runs up Belch's spindly neck, and PLUCKS the black sheep from the Twins' hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gotcha! She tumbles through the air onto Stormfly, sticking a perfect landing, black sheep in hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Astrid!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 6.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: beside himself. The crowd ROARS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well played! Hahaha! (gloating, to the crowd) That's my future daughter-in-law!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: eyeing the fast-approaching FINISH LINE, unaware as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: suddenly RAMS Meatlug into Stormfly, sending Astrid off-course. She recovers and sees Snotlout flying headlong toward her, war hammer cocked, aiming at Astrid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, excuse me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stormfly! Snotlout HURLS his hammer. Astrid ducks and rolls Stormfly out of the way. The hammer catches Fishlegs in the face with a CLANG. The crowd collectively winces. Astrid and Stormfly recover from their roll, loop over the water, and they BLAST past the finish line, DUNKING the black sheep into their basket!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's thirteen! Astrid takes the game! The crowd COMES UNHINGED. Astrid flies over the crowd, basking in her victory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Yep. Berk is pretty much perfect. All of my hard work has paid off. And it's a good thing, too, because with Vikings on the backs of dragons, the world just got a whole lot bigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 0300 - AWOL Part One) A boundless sky. Vast. Clear. Crisp. And from it, a BLACK SPECK rockets across the horizon. The image of unbridled freedom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 7. Tucked into his riding position, HICCUP appears to be part of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They dip, roll and dive, over a sea teeming with Thunderdrums, pulling off daring maneuvers with honed refinement, making them seem effortless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! They jackknife, heading skyward, rolling and tumbling through the ethereal cloud-scapes and joining high-flying Timberjacks as they soar in formation. Hiccup is bound head-to-toe in a snug, aerodynamic flight suit -- an asymmetrical, functional design of leather and articulated plates. It has an air of Viking bike leather.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think, bud? Wanna give this another shot? Toothless grumbles in protest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless! It'll be fine. With a click of a lever, he LOCKS the pedals in the flared tail position. Hiccup then unhooks himself from the saddle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready? Toothless SNORTS unenthusiastically. Suddenly, Hiccup SLIDES OFF of Toothless, peeling away from him like a skydiver from a plane, YELLING as he plummets. Toothless dives after him. They spiral through the air, face- to-face. Toothless is having fun, despite himself. Hiccup slips his forearms through a pair of tucked leather flaps... and YANKS, unfurling SHEETS OF LEATHER as he extends his arms. They catch the wind, SNAPPING OPEN like WINGS... and sending him GLIDING -- out of control, at first, then stabilizing. The turbulence buffets his flight suit heavily. But he's flying! Toothless unfolds his wings, too, catching up with Hiccup. The freedom is palpable. Hiccup and Toothless are, for the moment, the same. Feeling the same rush of adrenaline. Independently together. They PLUNGE past cloud formations, splitting apart then crossing paths again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 8. Impressive as it is, Hiccup is gliding at a steep angle. Toothless launches fireballs ahead of Hiccup, boosting him higher with the expanding heat bursts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is amazing! A cloud layer washes past, exposing a towering ROCK FORMATION, dead ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No longer amazing! Toothless! Hiccup tries to steer himself away, to no avail. Toothless POURS ON THE SPEED, trying to catch Hiccup as he
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: toward collision. His locked tail makes maneuvering difficult. He's UNABLE TO PULL UP at a steep enough angle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no! At the last second, Toothless BLASTS the jagged rocks just ahead of Hiccup, then WRAPS Hiccup in his wings as they fly through it. The obliterated peak rains down around them. Toothless emerges through the cloud of debris and HURTLES into the trees of a neighboring peak. They tumble down the uneven terrain, coming to rest on a small plateau. Hiccup emerges from the cocoon of Toothless' wings. He switches his prosthetic riding foot to his walking foot and stows his leather wings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That really came out of nowhere. The blown up sea stack collapses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We gotta work on your solo gliding there, bud. That locked-up tail makes for some pretty sloppy rescue maneuvers, eh? Hiccup reels in his dorsal fin and removes his helmet, revealing a 20 year old Hiccup framed by wild hair, complete with a Viking braid. He walks to the edge of the cliff, taking in the NEW LAND stretching off into the horizon, its tall cliffs and sea- stacks adorned with swaying gold birch trees basking in the dappled afternoon sunlight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 9.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like we found another one, bud. Toothless FUSSES and SNORTS, not amused, shaking off dust and pebbles like a wet dog. Hiccup flinches as a pebble WHACKS him on the back of the head. He looks back to Toothless, who averts his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, what? Do you want an apology? Is that why you're pouting, big baby boo? Well... try this on! Hiccup TACKLES Toothless and tries to put him in a headlock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ya feeling it yet? Huh? Picking up on all my heartfelt remorse? Toothless simply stands on his hind legs, lifting Hiccup off of his flailing feet and dangling him over the cliff's edge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, come on. You wouldn't hurt a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup looks down, seeing the precipitous drop below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're right! You're right! You win! You win!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Toothless flips him over, pinning him to the ground. Hiccup squirms, throwing mock punches. Toothless playfully retaliates with feline taps to Hiccup's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's down! And it's ugly! Dragons and Vikings, enemies again, locked in combat to the bitter -- URFFF! Toothless rests his head on Hiccup -- SQUEEZING THE AIR out of him. Toothless then suddenly starts grooming Hiccup, lapping at his face and covering him in slobber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gaaaaagh! Hiccup fights to get free, finally springing to his feet and shaking off the viscous saliva.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 10.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You KNOW that doesn't wash out. Toothless LAUGHS, pleased with himself. Shifting his attention back to the new land stretched out before them, Hiccup reaches beneath his chest plate and produces a leather-bound book. He unfurls it to reveal an EXPLORERS MAP, modified with added strips in every direction to accommodate their ever-expanding world. Drawings indicate new lands, new tribes, and many new dragons. Hiccup peels a fresh strip of paper from a hidden fold in his flight suit and holds it out for Toothless to lick. Hiccup affixes the moistened strip to the map's outer edge, then whittles a pencil and consults a compass affixed to his forearm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what should we name it? Toothless GURGLES as he gnaws under his wing, preoccupied.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Itchy Armpit" it is. Hiccup carefully draws the new island's outline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whaddya reckon, bud? Think we might find a few Timberjacks in those woods? The odd Whispering Death or two in the rocks? Who knows... maybe we'll finally track down another Night Fury. (BEAT) Wouldn't that be something? (BURDENED) So, whaddya say? Just keep going? Toothless' ear plates suddenly SHOOT UP. He ROARS, and his call is answered by a familiar SCREECH. Hiccup turns to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 0325 - AWOL Part Two)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rising into view, astride Stormfly. Stormfly grabs talon-fulls of rock to slow her landing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 11.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: `Afternoon m'lady. Where have you been? Astrid dismounts and throws back her fur hood as Toothless rushes up to greet them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Winning races. What else? The real question is... where have YOU been?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Avoiding my dad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no. What happened now? Astrid sits beside Hiccup, inspecting his latest addition to the map. Behind them, Toothless greets Stormfly, inciting a play fight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you're gonna love this. I wake up. The sun's shining. Terrible Terrors are singing on the rooftop. I saunter down to breakfast, thinking all is right with the world, and I get... He gets to his feet and puffs out his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Son, we need to talk. Astrid smiles and adopts Hiccup's sloppy slouch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not now, Dad. I've got a whole day of goofing off to get started. Hiccup breaks character, grimacing at her impression of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, first of all, I don't sound like that. What is this character? And second... what is that thing you're doing with my shoulders? Astrid laughs, jostling her shoulders in an awkward way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 12.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A truly flattering impersonation. Anyway, he goes... (resuming Stoick's brogue) You're the pride of Berk, son, and I couldn't be prouder...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (continuing her impression
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw, thanks, Dad. I'm pretty impressed with myself, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: have I ever done that with my hands?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You just did. She laughs, playfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay... just... (holding her arms, mock-
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold still. It's very serious. She giggles, trying to hold a straight face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (resuming Stoick's brogue) You're all grown up, and since no chief could ask for a better successor, I've decided-- Astrid straightens, her face brightening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Oh, my gods! She jumps to her feet, beaming...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup, that's amazing! And socks Hiccup in congratulations, deliberately hitting the dorsal fin release button and triggering it to pop up. She laughs as Hiccup reels it back in, self-consciously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna wear out the spring coil. The calibration is very sensitive!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 13. They're suddenly BOWLED OVER by Toothless and Stormfly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, so... this is what I'm dealing with. Astrid helps him up and dusts him off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you tell him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't. By the time he turned around, I was gone. Astrid picks up the map, folding it as she paces around him, processing it all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's a lot of responsibility. The map will have to wait for sure, and I'll need to fly Toothless, since you'll be too busy... She pauses, wincing in sympathy. She turns to Hiccup. He nods knowingly, taking the map from her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not me, Astrid. All those speeches, and planning, and running the village... that's his thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you're missing the point. I mean, chief. What an honor. I'd be pretty excited. Hiccup shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not like you. You know exactly who you are. You always have. But... He shuffles to the cliff's edge, gazing out at the new land.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm still looking. I know that I'm not my father... and I never met my mother... so, what does that make me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 14. He sits at the edge, looking burdened, restless. Astrid approaches and settles beside him, joining him in looking out at the distant horizon. She weaves another braid into his hair as she speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What you're searching for... isn't out there, Hiccup. She places a hand on his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's in here. (BEAT) Maybe you just don't see it yet. She kisses his cheek, but gets a mouthful of Toothless' slobber. She grimaces, wiping it off. Distracted, Hiccup eyes the horizon keenly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe. But, y'know... there is something out there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup... He turns her face to the horizon. A distant smoke plume rises from a misty valley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 0400 - Shot Down!) Hiccup and Toothless fly over the fjord, winding deep through undulating crimson and gold forests. Astrid and Stormfly catch up as the autumn colors suddenly give way to charred timbers. They fly deeper, through ash and wafting smoke. Ahead, in a sheltered harbor, an explosion of ice stands as an eerie marker of what used to be a TRAPPER'S FORT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay close. They fly through the suspended remains of the buildings, splintered, and frozen in mid-destruction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 15. It's at once harrowing and puzzling. Toothless spots an enormous DRAGON FOOTPRINT in the muddy shoreline below, leaving him uneasy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easy, bud. As they crest the ice formations, Astrid spots a CREW OF MEN at the stern of a moored ship below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Fire! The men fire a stern-mounted cannon. The projectile unfurls into a NET. Hiccup and Toothless dart out of its way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Astrid! Look out! It HITS Stormfly, TANGLING her wings and causing her to spin uncontrolled. Astrid struggles to free her as they HURTLE toward a collision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Astrid falls off of Stormfly, but Toothless SNATCHES her at the last second. Stormfly hits the ground, tangled in the net. Trappers rush out of hiding, piling onto her with ropes and weapons. She whips her tail, sending spikes flying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch the tail! A large, raven-haired trapper lunges over the spray of spikes and lands upon Stormfly's head, twisting it and taking her down like a rodeo cowboy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tie those legs up! Eret deftly ties her gnashing jaws shut, wrangling her into submission -- clearly a pro among pros. He looks up, revealing a handsome face and gleaming, intelligent eyes that search the sky as Toothless' tell-tale BANSHEE scream rings out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that what I think it is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 16. Toothless suddenly streaks across the sky, banking and landing with a FEROCIOUS ROAR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! (to the trappers) What are you doing? Astrid and Hiccup leap off of Toothless, rushing toward Stormfly. Eret's men immediately draw weapons. Hiccup extends and ignites his DRAGON BLADE -- a telescoping fiery sword -- impressive enough to wow Eret's men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back again? Eret steps forward, focused only on Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Soil my britches... that is a Night Fury. Thought they were all gone for good. (to his fellow trappers) Looks like our luck's had a turn for the better, lads! Don't think Drago has one of those in his dragon army. His men sound out in agreement. Hiccup eyes Astrid, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragon army?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, we don't want any trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha! You should've thought of that before you stole all of our dragons and blasted our fort to bits!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about? Astrid and Hiccup take in the icy destruction, putting it together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 17.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think we did this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragon trapping is hard enough work as it is, without do-gooder dragon riders sneaking in to rescue them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do-gooder -- there are other dragon riders?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean, other than your thieving friend from last night? You tell me. Eret approaches. Toothless snarls, protectively.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You may have an ice-spitting dragon on your side, but we still have a quota to fill. How do you suppose we explain this mess to Drago Bludvist?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drago what-fist? Does anything you say make sense?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's expecting a new shipment of dragons for his army by tomorrow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Drago don't take well to excuses. Eret parts his tunic, revealing a large branding-iron scar on his torso, in the shape of a dragon skull, split by a sword.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is what he gave me last time I showed up empty-handed. He promised to be far less understanding in the future.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, we don't know anything about a dragon thief, or an ice-spitting dragon, or your lunatic boss and his dragon army, okay? (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 18.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just give us back our dragon, and we'll go, strange, hostile person whom we've never met. Eret bows playfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, where are my manners? I'm Eret. Son of Eret. Finest dragon trapper alive. He pulls a dagger from behind his back, waving it cockily. His men ready their weapons and net cannons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After all, it's not just anyone who can capture a Night Fury. Toothless ROARS a warning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And this is Toothless. He says we're going. Now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heh. They all say that. (BEAT)

direction.raw_text: ... tilting his masked head, curious. He dismounts his dragon and approaches Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who are you? The Dragon Thief? Drago Bludvist? The warrior circles Hiccup in silence, taking in his gear, his dragon blade, his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you even understand what I'm saying?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 37. The warrior whirls and HAMMERS his staff. In response, a large dragon ASCENDS from the depths, carrying...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless! Toothless is dumped on the ground next to Hiccup, sopping wet. Hiccup rushes to him, petting him reassuringly. Toothless coos in relief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay. I'm glad to see you, too, bud. You really had me worried there. The warrior rattles his staff at a nearby dragon. In response, it and the surrounding dragons produce firelight from their throats, spotlighting Hiccup and Toothless. The warrior sets down his staff and shield, then approaches Hiccup, cautiously and animal-like. Toothless SNARLS and circles Hiccup defensively, but then instantly yields to the stranger's outstretched hand. With a quick, disarming gesture, the warrior lays Toothless down in a state of bliss. Hiccup is astounded. The warrior's hand continues toward Hiccup's face. He recoils, but the warrior persists, finding the faint scar on Hiccup's chin, glinting in the firelight. The warrior GASPS and retreats a few steps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispered, shaken) Hiccup? (BEAT) Could it be? After all these years? How is this possible? The voice is surprisingly female.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, should I... should I know you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. You were only a babe... The warrior slowly removes the strange mask, revealing VALKA, 40, beneath. Her eyes meet his, equally wide-eyed and aghast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... but a mother never forgets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 38. Hiccup stammers, tongue-tied, aghast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Sequence 1325 - Searching) Stoick and Gobber search over the frigid waves that lap against the pack ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boar-headed! Just like his mother! She could never stay put either. Gobber glances over at Stoick, who's hunched over, brow furrowed and solemn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, he's just twenty. And a Viking. I mean, could there be a worse combination? Ha! When I think of how stubborn and senseless YOU were back in the day... well, not much has changed, actually.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what he's like. He won't give up, Gobber. And if Hiccup finds Drago, before we find him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bah! NOTHING can hurt Hiccup so long as that Night Fury's around. It's a Night Fury! Framed by a hole in the ice, a glistening object bobs on the surface below. Stoick squints and CIRCLES BACK, leading Skullcrusher in a DIVE toward it. Stoick SNAGS it out of the water. It's Hiccup's helmet. Gobber pulls alongside Stoick, seeing his look of dread. Stoick holds the helmet out for his dragon to SMELL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find him, Skullcrusher. Find him. Skullcrusher SNIFFS the helmet like a bloodhound, ROARS, and suddenly CHANGES HEADING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 39.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 1400 - A New Family)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON Hiccup, flustered, winded, chasing VALKA through tightly winding corridors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on! Wait just a minute! Come back here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This way. Come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't just say something like that and run off! You're my mother?! I mean, what the -- do you grasp how INSANE it sounds?! (BEAT) I have questions!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come. Quickly! Hiccup follows her over the difficult terrain. He tries to clamber over a tall rock, unsuccessfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where have you been all this time? Toothless boosts him over. Hiccup lands on the other side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What've you been doing?! They said you were dead! Everyone thinks you were eaten by... Hiccup trails off as he enters...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... a stadium-sized chamber teeming with ferns, waterfalls, hot springs and THOUSANDS of new DRAGONS. Hiccup wanders in, basking in the in the amazing sight: a dome of sweating ice capping a geothermal micro climate, filled with dragons of every shape and kind. He spots Valka clinging to a basalt overhang, watching him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 40.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is where you've been for twenty years? She nods from her perch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've been rescuing them. She nods again, this time with a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unbelievable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not upset?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? No. I don't know. It's a bit much to get my head around, to be frank. It's not every day you find out your mother is some kind of crazy, feral, vigilante dragon lady. Valka chuckles, and using her dragon's wing, lowers herself to the ground like a skilled acrobat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At least I'm not boring... right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I suppose there is that... (feeble, trailing off) ... one... specific... thing... Excited dragons rush up to greet Hiccup and Toothless. Hiccup pets a few, marveling at the vast dragon utopia before him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you like it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have the words. Toothless SNARLS in annoyance as the curious, smothering dragons SNIFF every part of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I... ? He's beautiful! She reaches out to stroke Toothless, who PURRS at her touch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 41.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Incredible. He might very well be the last of his kind. She inspects his talons as Toothless rolls onto his back, nuzzling her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And look, he's your age! No wonder you get along so well. Hiccup smiles, astounded by Toothless' affection for Valka. She checks his teeth. They recede into the gums at her touch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And retractable teeth? Ah! How did you manage to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: found him in the woods. He was shot down and wounded. She winces and offers a sympathetic nod as she stands to caress a few of her own rescued dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This Snafflefang lost his leg to one of Drago Bludvist's iron traps. This Raincutter had her wing sliced by razor netting. And this poor Hobblegrunt was blinded by a tree snare... then left to die alone and scared. (re: Toothless' tail) And what of this? Did Drago or his trappers do this, too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heh. Well, crazy thing is... I'm actually the one who shot him down. She glares, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay though. He got me back. (playfully, to Toothless) Right, bud? You couldn't save all of me, could you? You just had to make it even. So... peg leg! Hiccup rattles his prosthetic leg with a smirk. Valka observes their playful rapport with curiosity.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 42.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did your father think of your Night Fury friend?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He didn't take it all that well. She mutters in agreement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But then... he changed. They all did. Pretty soon everyone back home had dragons of their own. She smiles at Toothless, dismissive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If only it were possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, really, I -- VALKA -- Believe me, I tried, as well. But people are not capable of change, Hiccup. Some of us... were just born different.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragons sweep from the sky, blowing FIRE, carrying off sheep and dried fish. Vikings chase them down, hurling weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Berk was a land of kill or be killed, but I believed peace was possible. A Viking is about to finish off a felled dragon, but Valka chases up to him and tugs at his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop! You'll only make it worse! The dragon takes wing, escaping to safety... leaving the Viking warrior glaring at Valka.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) It was a very unpopular opinion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 43. As he rushes off, Valka hears a clatter and whirls around to see a DRAGON (Cloudjumper) clawing its way through the roof of a house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cloudjumper enters the house through the hole in the roof, sniffing out a baby's cradle in the corner. Valka rushes in, panicked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) One night, a dragon broke into our house, finding you in the cradle. Valka draws a sword quietly, slipping up to the dragon, only to find it huddled protectively over the cradle as BABY HICCUP innocently plays with one of its talons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I rushed to protect you, but what I saw... was proof of everything I believed. Valka's careful approach causes a floorboard to squeak. Spooked, Cloudjumper whips around to face her, accidentally
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: baby Hiccup's chin. Their eyes meet. Valka lowers her sword, transfixed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) This wasn't a vicious beast, but an intelligent, gentle creature, whose soul reflected my own. Stoick's AXE spins through the air between them, barely missing Cloudjumper and planting into a pillar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valka, run! Alarmed, Cloudjumper WHIRLS around at Stoick and BLASTS! Stoick DIVES out of the way as the FIRE SPLATTERS against the wall, burning a hole and setting the room ablaze. The dragon moves toward Stoick, but Valka grabs hold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 44.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't! It turns to face her again, locking eyes, agitated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on! Stoick dashes through the fire toward Hiccup and pulls him out of the cradle. He pulls his axe from the pillar...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) No! Stoick! ... but in a WHOOSH of smoke and embers, the dragon and Valka are GONE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stoick! Stoick and baby Hiccup watch helplessly as the dragon spirits Valka away into the night sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valka...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with the fresh nick on his chin...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with the matching scar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You and your father nearly died that night, all because I couldn't kill a dragon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, it runs in the family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It broke my heart to stay away, but I believed you'd be safer if I did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 45. Hiccup considers this, then raises his eyes to hers, seeing the sting of remorse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you survive?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Cloudjumper never meant to harm me. He must've thought I belonged here... She leads him to the edge of raised natural terrace, overlooking the steamy oasis with its flowing hot spring waterfalls. Half-submerged in the warm lake below, a massive white dragon with pronounced, mammoth-like tusks rests benevolently on the banks, his stately countenance like that of a lion surrounded by his pride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the home of the great Bewilderbeast. The alpha species. One of very few that still exist. (BEAT) Every nest has its queen, but this is king of all dragons. Dragons land and bow reverentially to the Bewilderbeast. Valka gestures to the spiked ice ceiling that acts as a sweating greenhouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With his icy breath, this graceful giant built our nest. A safe haven for dragons everywhere. On HICCUP, putting it together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, that's the ice-spitter? He's responsible for all that destruction?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He protects us. We all live under his care. And his command. They pass an eggshell-littered NURSERY. HATCHLINGS dart out of it, greeting them excitedly and inciting chaos. Toothless is overwhelmed by their manic picking and scratching. Cloudjumper balks and sends them scattering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All but the babies, of course...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 46. The hatchlings clamber on top of the Bewilderbeast and play on his massive tusks, despite his authority. Valka laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... who listen to no one. The Bewilderbeast lets out a frosty SNORT, sending off the youngsters to spread more mischief. Now awakened, The Bewilderbeast raises his gargantuan head to take a closer look at Hiccup, coming eye to massive eye. Valka bows in his presence. As does Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've lived among them for twenty years, Hiccup, learning their ways, discovering their secrets... He acknowledges Hiccup with another icy snort, slicking back Hiccup's hair in a frosty veneer. Valka laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He likes you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow. She chuckles, delighting in his awe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must be hungry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, yeah. I could eat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. It's feeding time. Toothless tucks himself beneath Cloudjumper's wing, trying to befriend him, but Cloudjumper isn't having any of it. He grimaces and follows Valka out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 1200 - Astrid Takes Charge) Astrid and Stormfly circle a lone iceberg, being used as a rest stop for the Gang and their dragons. She lands with a frown, eyeing the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't like it. They should've been back with Hiccup by now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 47.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't like it either. Eret son of Eret was the man of my dreams. My everything!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, baby, I grew facial hair for you. Fishlegs strokes his peach fuzz beard, meek and dejected.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if Drago shot them down? What if they need our help? (RESOLUTE) We have to find them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? But Stoick said...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It doesn't matter what he said, if they've all been captured. Come on! She flies off, determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eret's ship is beset by ice floes. The crew stirs on deck as he paces, grumbling, while nursing his head with a large chunk of ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do we go back?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've nowhere to go! Nothing to sell! And no heads to call our own, if we don't turn up with dragons and fast -- He's suddenly scooped up in Stormfly's talons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Careful what you wish for!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 48. Nets whiz past as Astrid and the Gang rocket out of range.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A kidnapping. Ruffnut grabs his leg, clutching him possessively.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yay! Can he ride with me? Can he? Can he? Both Eret and Tuffnut groan in protest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna show us the way to Drago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And help dragon riders sneak into Drago's camp? Just kill me now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That can be arranged. Stormfly, drop it. In enthusiastic response, Stormfly pops open her talons, sending Eret plummeting. He wails and flails as he hurtles toward the ice far below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good girl! Stormfly, fetch. She dives after him, just as enthusiastically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: terrified, as the ground rushes up at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! OKAY! I'LL TAKE YOU TO DRAGO! Stormfly suddenly SNATCHES him out of his free-fall just before hitting the ice. Astrid giggles and cracks her knuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Works every time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 49.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 1600 - Momma's Boy)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup and Toothless follow Valka and Cloudjumper over a majestic fjord in the long rays of the low Arctic sun. Hiccup peers over his shoulder to see that a thick flock of dragons -- nearly all of Valka's rescues -- are close on their tail. He turns back to his mother, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, I thought we were going to eat?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (with a mischievous grin) Oh, we are. She directs his gaze below, where in the choppy water of the fjord, a group of Seashocker dragons are corralling a dense shoal of fish near the surface. Suddenly, the Bewilderbeast rises from deep below, scooping the fish up in its vast mouth as its tusks break the surface. It breaches just below Hiccup and Toothless, giving them a fright before spitting the fish into the air and crashing back down into the sea. Valka laughs at Hiccup's surprise as the hungry dragons race for the flailing fish, scooping them out of the air. Hiccup gestures to Toothless to join in and he gladly scoops up a mouth full.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CONTINUES... Hiccup has his map spread out in the snow, explaining the various lands he's discovered during his explorations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And from Dragon Island, I found this archipelago... He looks up to see that Valka is no longer next to him, but she has sketched out the rest of the northern land masses in the snow, wowing Hiccup with just how far and wide she has explored.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 50. She returned to Hiccup's side with a smile. But his amazement is interrupted by Toothless joining in, drawing all over Valka's map with a giant icicle. Hiccup simply shrugs as his mother giggles, and Cloudjumper sneers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Valka and Hiccup rise on their dragons, carried skyward by a strong coastal wind that thrusts vertical up shoreline cliff. One by one, dragons leap from the cliff and catch the strong updraft, popping their wings open like kites. They ride the wind and orbit around each other in a colorful, mesmeric dance. It's clearly a form of dragon play. Hiccup, lifted off of his saddle by the force of the wind, laughs giddily as he watches Valka walk across Cloudjumper's wing and onto several others, dragon-hopping from one to another, until she gracefully crosses Toothless from wing tip to wing tip. She then drops out of sight, reappearing a moment later standing atop Cloudjumper. Hiccup is in utter awe of her. Valka breathes in the frigid air. Lets it out blissfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I'm up here, I don't even feel the cold. I just feel...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Free. She smiles at Hiccup. He gleams back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is what it is to be a dragon, Hiccup. Hiccup LOCKS the pedals in the flared tail position and unbuckles himself. Valka watches, curious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all well and good to call yourself a dragon. Hiccup RUNS OFF of Toothless, pulling his stowed wings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But can you fly? They catch the air, SNAPPING OPEN... and sending him GLIDING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 51. Valka GASPS, astonished. She flies her dragon alongside him, marvelling, as... ... Hiccup SOARS, riding the wild air currents like an eagle, the image of freedom. Toothless descends steadily with him, hovering protectively. Hiccup grins, pleased at having impressed Valka... until he realizes that he is once again racing toward a collision with a fast approaching mountain top.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no. Toothless! But, with his tail locked, Toothless can't make the tight jackknife turn skyward to rescue Hiccup. Realizing that they're in trouble, Valka and Cloudjumper pour on the speed. All four of them collide just as they reach the mountain top, sending them crash-landing in an explosion of snow. They all TOPPLE head over tail to a messy landing on the wind- swept ridge and pop up LAUGHING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man! Almost! We just about had it that time! Toothless raises his snow-packed face, glowering. He tail- swipes Hiccup off of his feet and back into the powder. Valka inspects Hiccup's wing suit with utter fascination.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Incredible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, not bad yourself. She caresses his cheek, staring deep into his eyes. Hiccup doesn't recoil this time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All this time, you took after me. And where was I? (REMORSEFUL) I'm so sorry, Hiccup. Can we start over? Will you give me another chance? Hiccup smiles, a simple acknowledgement that all is forgiven.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 52.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can teach you all I've learned, these past twenty years. Like... Valka finds a spot at the top of Toothless' neck and rubs in a circular pattern. In response, his dorsal blades slowly crack, split and extend, forming a pronounced, aerodynamic `V' down the length of his back and tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now you can make those tight turns. Toothless shudders, as if experiencing a much-needed chiropractic adjustment. He bounds over to Hiccup, giddily retracting and splaying his dorsal blades like a kid with a new toy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did YOU know about this? Valka smiles, delighting in their mutual amazement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every dragon has its secrets. Toothless pounces around, showing off to Cloudjumper, who seems thoroughly unimpressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I'll show them all to you. We'll unlock every mystery, find every last species, together, as mother and son. (BEAT) This gift we share, Hiccup... it bonds us. This is who you are, son. Who we are. We will change the world for all dragons! We will make it a better, safer place!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That sounds... amazing. She pulls him into a hug -- forceful, bursting with emotion. Hiccup hugs Valka back. They share a cathartic moment, before Hiccup peels away from her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is so great! Now you and I can go talk to Drago -- together! She chuckles, incredulous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 53.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? There's no talking to Drago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we have to -- VALKA -- No. We must protect our own. Hiccup stares, exasperated by the familiar line. Cloudjumper lumbers over, eager to be rid of Toothless' puppy-like energy. Valka pets him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now come on, we should be getting back. Before Hiccup can say anymore, he hear heavy breathing next to him, and looks over to see Toothless with a gaping grin, clapping his dorsal blades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 1350 - Meet Drago) Astrid and the gang stealthily approach a cluster of tabular icebergs, collapsed against each other at the mouth of a maze. Stormfly drops Eret to the snow, but before he can flee, she lands atop him and nests like a hen with her egg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agghh! Okay! I got you here, now get this thing off me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never take a toy from a dragon. Don't you know anything? Stormfly crushes him in place under her weight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gah! Why does this keep happening to me? Astrid crawls up the rising ridge to reveal...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: moored together like a floating camp in the deep water between collided icebergs. Thick chains run deep into the water, where great blasts of bubbles erupt on the surface. The unseen creature rocks the ships. Its effect alone describes it as gargantuan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 54.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's down there? Fishlegs rifles through his note cards contained in his belt pouch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Large diameter bubbles, massive lungs, cold water deep dweller, I'm thinking class five leviathan, maybe six. Suddenly, Stormfly is alerted to an encroaching menace and takes wing. BLOW DARTS whiz through the air, hitting the other dragons. The effect is immediate -- they fall to the ground, unconscious. Drugged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meatlug! What's wrong, girl? Eret spring to his feet and draws his blades. Astrid and the Gang find themselves surrounded by soldiers, camouflaged in polar bear furs, and poised to fire darts. They're outnumbered. Fishlegs raises his hands, dropping the cards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a hulking figure draped in a dragon skin cloak, crouches over the prow of the fleet's grisly flagship, adorned in massive dragon bones and skulls. His scarred face is masked by thick, grizzled dreadlocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Drago turns to see Astrid, Eret, and the Gang being forcibly escorted onto the deck. Eret SHAKES HIMSELF FREE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get off me! In the background, a sledge, loaded with Hookfang, Meatlug, Belch and Barf -- all unconscious -- is dragged onto the deck by armored dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Always great to see you, my friend! Keeping warm up here? The soldiers disarm him, pushing him forward as Drago approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 55.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, as you can see, I'm right on time with a new batch of dragons, just like I promised. Hookfang awakens, groggily shaking off the effect of the blow- dart. He rears as soldiers struggle to reign him in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch out! He's waking up! Keep him steady!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me some backup here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drop the ropes. They do so. Hookfang bucks and roars, chasing off the soldiers, then focusing on Drago as he closes in. The armored dragons avert their eyes and cower as Drago passes. Hookfang HISSES a warning, but Drago approaches, undaunted. Hookfang BLASTS. In a blur, Drago wraps himself in his dragon skin cloak. The sticky, napalm-like fire splatters against the fireproof scales, enveloping Drago in dripping flames as he persists forward without missing a step. As the blast ends, Drago drops the cloak, closing in and holding a cold stare. Hookfang lets out a ferocious ROAR. Drago YELLS back with a fierce, savage scream, interrupting Hookfang and causing him to recoil. Drago whirls his bull- hook overhead and STABS it into the deck planks. Hookfang stirs, his aggression fading in the face of Drago's unflinching show of dominance. After a moment, Hookfang averts his eyes and lowers his head in submission. Drago places his boot upon Hookfang's snout, pressing it into the deck planks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hookfang!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 56.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (quiet, to the dragon) You belong to me now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And as an added bonus, I also caught you their riders. No extra charge. Drago notices the saddle on Hookfang's back. His eyes wander to the saddle on Meatlug. Alarm flashes in Drago's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?! Are you kidding me?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you were so perfect!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turns out, there's a whole bunch of them out there. They -- In a flash, Drago stops toward Eret and seizes him by the throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many? As Eret chokes, stammering, Astrid whispers to the gang.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drago doesn't have them after all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hundreds! A whole island full! His grip tightens around Eret's neck as he turns to Astrid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't worry about it. My men are hunting them down as we speak. They won't know where you're hiding. I promise you that. Astrid nods a covert signal to the Gang -- she has a plan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes they will! Drago drops Eret as Astrid advances, staring Drago down. Eret tries to signal her to stop, but it's no use.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 57.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They know we're missing and they have tracking dragons. If you so much as touch us, Hiccup is gonna
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not a problem. Really. Trust me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's only the son of Stoick the Vast... Drago's eyes narrow upon hearing Stoick's name.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... his heir to the throne of Berk... and the greatest dragon master this world has ever seen!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragon master? I ALONE control the dragons!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And unless you let us go, right now, he will blast through here on his Night Fury and blow your entire fleet of ships to splinters! Eret slips away, trying to distance himself from the tension.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then they'll be crying like babies!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Funny and beautiful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good one, babe! Ruffnut groans, exasperated by their smarmy advances.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 58.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Like babies. They always cry. Real tiny ones... Drago grabs Eret by the face and bears down on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First there was one rider. And now all of Berk. (TO ERET) And YOU led them to me. He THROWS Eret across the deck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drago!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! WE MUST ATTACK THE DRAGONS RIDER'S NEST AT ONCE! (SAVORING IT)
direction.name: direction

result.heading: WE MUST ATTACK THE DRAGONS RIDER'S NEST AT ONCE
WE WILL TAKE DOWN THEIR ALPHA

direction.raw_text: ! Soldiers CHEER in the thousands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're overreacting!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And get rid of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Drago, please... The soldiers HURL throwing knives at Eret... But Stormfly lands in a blur of wings, shielding Eret from the flurry of blades. She whips her tail, throwing spikes in all directions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Stormfly ROARS protectively, hiding Eret within her wings, until a well-blown dart sinks into her neck, bringing her down...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NO! Revealing Eret, gawking in shock.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: AND THEN WE WILL TAKE BERK

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 59.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 1800 - Family Reunion) Hiccup reattaches his flight suit while standing on a ledge overlooking the utopian nest, teeming with dragons. Several babies race in to hassle Toothless as he naps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, bud, we can't wait around for Drago to attack this place. We've gotta find him first. Let's go. Suddenly, a thick hand clamps down over Hiccup's face -- muffling his scream! Toothless whirls around to find STOICK, towering over Hiccup. He calms Toothless with a touch and releases Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easy now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you kidding me? How'd you get in here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The same way we're getting you out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We? Gobber appears in the arch of a tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All clear!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless. Come. They hurry back into the winding corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad! There's something you need to know!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah, tell me on the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't an on-the-way kind of update, actually...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 60.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've heard ENOUGH, Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... more of the earth-shattering development variety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, just add it to the pile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, unlike most surprises I spring on you, this is one you'll like. I promise! You just have to handle it delicately, so... They round a tight bend in the corridor to find Gobber staring blankly at something unseen in the next chamber. He shuffles past Stoick and Hiccup, dazed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, you might want to take this one. Oh, boy. Stoick draws his SWORD, then braves into the chamber ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, can you put the sword away... please? Stoick GASPS as if seeing a ghost... and drops his sword with a clatter. Valka stands some twenty paces ahead of him, blocking the path. She lets out an audible SHUDDER upon seeing him. He removes his helmet slowly as Hiccup, Gobber, and Toothless appear at Stoick's side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what you're going to say, Stoick. How could I have done this? Stayed away all of these years. And why didn't I come back to you? To our son. Stoick steps towards her, wide-eyed and speechless. Dragons emerge from the recesses behind Valka, hissing protectively.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what sign did I have that you could change, Stoick? That anyone on Berk could? (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 61.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I pleaded so many times to stop the fighting, to find another answer, but did any of you listen?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is why I never married. (BEAT) This and one other reason. Stoick continues to close the gap, mesmerized. With every step, Valka becomes increasingly flustered. She backs into an ice wall, with nowhere to go, and Stoick just a few paces away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know that I left you to raise Hiccup alone... but I thought he'd be better off without me. And I was wrong, I see that now, but... Stoick gently reaches a hand toward her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh stop being so stoic, Stoick. Go on... SHOUT, SCREAM, SAY SOMETHING!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're as beautiful as the day I lost you. His words snuff her retort, rendering her speechless. She softens despite herself, yielding her cheek to his palm. He caresses her skin as a reluctant tear runs through his fingers. He PULLS her into a KISS. She resists briefly, then gives in. The surrounding dragons softly RETREAT in kind. Hiccup gapes, warmed by the sight of his parents reunited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 1750 - Eret's Turn) Drago's massive flagship leads the flotilla, pulled along forcefully by whatever's at the other end of the enormous chain. Drago WHACKS the chain with his bullhook, spurring it forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 62. Eret, Astrid, and the Gang are escorted to the stern, surrounded by several of Drago's soldiers. Wrists bound. Spear tips pressed into their backs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could this day get any worse?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, let me see. You'll jump into freezing cold water and then die from drowning. They reach the gang plank. Eret peers overboard at the deep, icy water below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks refreshing. He turns to Astrid, meeting her glare with mock chivalry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, ladies first. A pair of soldiers GRAB Astrid by the arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are a steaming heap of dragon -- ERET -- Duck. Eret WHIRLS around, ROUND-HOUSING both soldiers. They GO DOWN, heavily. He catches one of their spears with his bound hands and slices his ropes free. They fall away as he catches the other spear, twirling both in invitation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Warn the others! One soldier runs to send up the alarm... while the last two raise BLOW DART TUBES. Eret SWIPES the first off of his legs, sending the dart into the neck of the second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get `em, you son of an Eret! As the downed soldiers SCRAMBLE to their feet, Fishlegs FALLS OVER, CRUSHING them under his weight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 63. Eret CATCHES the falling tube from the second soldier and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the dart at the fleeing third. The soldier DROPS, unconscious -- just shy of the Captain's Quarters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I love you again. Ruffnut skips past Snotlout on her way to Eret. Snotlout watches, crestfallen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ugh. Pathetic. You can still jump. Eret avoids Ruffnut and turns to Astrid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So? Are we going to save your dragons and get out of here or not? Astrid narrows her eyes, not knowing what to make of him. He reclaims his sword and dagger from the unconscious soldier who took them and cuts Tuffnut free.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Check every trap. They're here somewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Astrid slips under a tarp and cranks open a metal trap. She peers between its massive iron teeth, discovering Meatlug within, bound and chained to its base as bait.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meatlug?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carefully cranking another trap, wincing at the sound. The iron jaws of the trap open wider with every CLICK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyone coming? Ruffnut "stands guard," fixated on Eret's rippling biceps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. You just keep doing what you're doing. Keep crankin'... Eret squeezes between the cocked teeth, finding Stormfly within, muzzled and chained. She looks up at Eret, calming immediately. He pauses, then approaches slowly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 64. Eret carefully reaches out and strokes Stormfly's muzzle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you for saving my life. (BEAT) Now let me return the favor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 1850 - The Last Dance) As Toothless and Cloudjumper hover for scraps, Stoick and Valka prepare skewers of fish. She's overwhelmed, lost in her thoughts, and covering it up poorly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mom, you'd never recognize it! Where we used to make weapons, we now build saddles, wing slings -- we even fix dragon teeth! You wouldn't believe how much everything's changed! Valka offers a skittish half-smile and hands him a plate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our son's changed Berk for the better. I think we did well with this one, Val.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, Dad. Stoick places his hands on Valka's shoulders. She flinches, dropping the plate. Cloudjumper steals the fish before Toothless can get to it. Toothless whimpers, and as a sign of acceptance, Cloudjumper regurgitates the fish so Toothless can have some.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm... a little out of practice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, y'know... I didn't marry you for your cooking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Hiccup and Grump) I hope not. Her meatballs could kill more beasts than a battle axe. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 65.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've still got a few knocking around in here. Ha ha! Gobber takes a bite, gags, and dump the entire plate of fish skewers into Grump's mouth like a trash can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And once you move back in, with all of your dragons, Drago won't even stand a chance. Everything will be okay! Stoick can see that Valka is overwhelmed. He lays a hand upon Hiccup's shoulder, calming him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slow down, son. It's a lot to take in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. Gotcha. Valka crosses the room to fill a flask with water, back turned to the group, as Stoick eyes her sympathetically. He decides on a different approach... and whistles a familiar tune.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as her eyes widen, stirred, recognizing the melody. She turns away from Stoick, as the water overflows from the flask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I love this one! Stoick approaches her delicately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember our song, Val? Hiccup watches him, curious, as Stoick FUMBLES THROUGH THE FIRST VERSE of an old Viking courting song:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll swim and sail on savage seas, with ne'er a fear of drowning. And gladly ride the waves of life, if you will marry me. Valka avoids his gaze, wallowing in a mess of emotions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 66.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No scorching sun, nor freezing cold
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: -- will stop me on my journey! (catching himself,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry. Stoick scowls at him, then returns his attention to Valka.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you will promise me your heart... Stoick pauses, setting Valka up for her part of the duet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And love... Stoick hangs eagerly, awaiting her words, but Valka closes her eyes, rejecting his invitation. He lets out a heavy- hearted sigh. But nostalgia gets the better of Valka. She softly SINGS HER PART:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And love me for eternity. Stoick beams. She brushes past him, setting into the center of the chamber and holding her forearm aloft in invitation. Stoick crosses his forearm against hers, initiating a beautiful dance to accompany the song.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My dearest one, my darling dear, you mighty words astound me. But I've no need of mighty deeds, when I feel your arms around me. The dance is full of charming missteps as Stoick and Valka recreate a moment from their past, before Hiccup's wonder- struck eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I would bring you rings of gold. I'd even sing you poetry. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 67.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I would keep you from all harm, if you'd stay here beside me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have no use for rings of gold. I care not for your poetry. I only want your hand to hold. I only want you near me. Gobber can't help himself. He drags Hiccup onto his feet so that he can join in the dancing, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, Hiccup!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & GOBBER (SINGING) To love and kiss, to sweetly hold. For the dancing and the dreaming. Through all life's sorrows and delights, I'll keep your love inside me. Hiccup is amazed by the sight of his giddy parents, spinning and laughing in each others' arms, reunited.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & GOBBER (CONT'D) (SINGING) I'll swim and sail through savage seas, with ne'er a fear of drowning. And gladly ride the waves of life, if you will marry me! Gobber carries the last note...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm still going... Hiccup taps him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gobber!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm done. Valka and Stoick slow to a stop, WINDED and LAUGHING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah... I thought I'd have to die before we'd have that dance again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 68.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No need for drastic measures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For you, my dear... anything. She smiles sweetly. Stoick's eyes well with tears. He goes down on one knee, proposing to her anew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will you come home, Val? Will you be my wife once again? Toothless nudges Valka closer to Stoick. They laugh as Hiccup joins them. Stoick throws his arm around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can be a family! What do you say? Valka, between tears and laughter, turns to Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! Gobber pops his head in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great! I'll do the cooking! They laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank Odin you didn't listen to me, son. We never would have found each other. Suddenly, Toothless and Cloudjumper suddenly perk up, sensing something unheard. Hiccup notices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless? Dragons SWARM past Valka's chamber, racing toward some unknown disturbance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's happening? They're answered by subsequent HEAVY BOOMS that reverberate through the fortress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 69.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 1900 - Surprise Guests) Valka rushes out to find...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in the lagoon below and his forces of thousands now landed upon the beach. They launch catapults and ballistas into the icy spires, gaining entrance into the mountain's tunnels. Hiccup, Stoick, and Gobber catch up to Valka.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no... Valka tries to hurry off, fuming. Stoick stops her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Val! It's all right, it's all right. We're a team now. (BEAT) Now what do you want to do? She glances from Hiccup to Stoick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have to save the dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aye. You got it! He throws an arm around Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: down to engage the attackers, picking up soldiers and carrying them off while Drago stands in the line of fire, unflinching. The catapults continue to bring down the icy defenses of dragon mountain. Drago's men pour into the tunnels. DRAGO Whatever comes, keep hitting the mountain! We need to draw the alpha out.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ON THE BATTLEFIELD VALKA'S DRAGONS SWOOP

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 70. Drago's armored DRAGON ARMY takes wing, clashing with Valka's dragons in the skies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready the traps! Iron jaws are opened like bear traps, revealing screeching `bait' dragons within. Valka's dragons swoop down to rescue them, only to be SNAPPED UP in the fearsome jaws. A second set of traps are cocked open, but instead of dragon cries, ZIPPLEBACK GAS seeps out... followed by an EXPLOSION. The TWINS rocket out of the trap, riding BARF and BELCH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surprise! Yeah!
