direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ?! They're joined by Astrid and the rest of the GANG, bursting out of the traps atop Meatlug and Hookfang. Eret comes flying out last, WAILING aboard Stormfly. He struggles to hold on, as she rejoins Astrid (riding Meatlug, along with Fishlegs). He gives them a sheepish shrug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really are full of surprises. She leaps onto Stormfly, steadying them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go! Together they rocket across the sky...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragon Riders coming through! And DIVE-BOMB the traps, setting them aflame. The yokes and leather bindings restraining the bait dragons are incinerated, freeing them to fly away, unharmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Projectiles are launched, one of which KNOCKS Ruffnut off her dragon. She PLUMMETS past Eret toward the rocky shore below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eret, son of Eret! She suddenly grabbed by both arms before hitting the rocks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 71.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : of Snotlout on one side... and Fishlegs on the other. SOFT and ROMANTICIZED as her epiphany dawns. Above them, more catapults fire, bringing down massive spires of ice, directly over Astrid and Eret.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up, girl! To the left, Eret! That's it! Look out! It's about to crush them when... it's BLOWN TO PIECES by Toothless' fireball. Hiccup, Stoick, and Gobber come bursting through the flames on their dragons. Hiccup and Toothless arc across the sky triumphantly and set their sights on a downed dragon surrounded by soldiers. Toothless BLASTS one of Drago's net launchers, knocking it onto its side. Stoick then CHOPS the trigger line, FIRING the catapult and NETTING the throng of soldiers, freeing the dragon. Drago's ARCHERS target Stoick with their arrows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take `em down!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heads up! Gobber flies up from behind, KNOCKING the archers out with Grump's tail. Gobber chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hears Toothless' tell-tale BANSHEE scream and turns to see him streaking across the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragon Master. Hiccup catches up to Astrid and Eret on Stormfly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome aboard, dragon rider!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. I think. Astrid glares, both relieved and annoyed to see Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where have you been?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, y'know. Catching up with Mom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 72. Astrid shoots him a confused glare. He nods skyward. Astrid and Eret look up to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in full warrior garb, rising from the towering ice spikes, atop Cloudjumper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa... An earth-trembling roar follows as the Bewilderbeast rises behind Valka.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's your mother?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, now you know where I get my dramatic flair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: gawking in awe as the great BEWILDERBEAST BLASTS an epic explosion of ice upon the attackers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The alpha! Now we have a fight! Valka blasts overhead on Cloudjumper, commanding swarms of dragons to swoop down and attack Drago's army. A swarm of Zipplebacks set themselves aflame and roll like fiery wagon wheels through the battlefield, scattering soldiers and destroying war machines. One of them gets CAUGHT under a Dragon Swatter, but Hiccup and Toothless double-back for a rescue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There! Come on, Toothless! Show them what you got, bud. Toothless dive-bombs the swatter and DESTROYS it with a plasma bolt, freeing the dragon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thatta boy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on Cloudjumper as they pry Drago's armored dragons off of the flailing wild ones. A net suddenly envelops Cloudjumper. They CRASH heavily, but Valka cuts herself free, sliding to a stop just paces away from Drago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've waited a long time for this! Drago cocks his bull hook, ready to strike, but Valka deflects Drago's hit and attacks him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 73.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot take our dragons! They are controlled by the alpha!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then it's a good thing I brought a challenger. He turns to the flagship and YELLS savagely, whirling his bullhook overhead. The heavy chains are released. The underwater creature, now freed, breaks the surface in an epic cascade of seawater. It rises toward the shoreline, revealing itself to be...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: bigger, meaner, and covered in scars that indicate years of training and abuse. The chains fall away from iron cuffs fastened to its massive tusks. Valka GASPS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another one?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! THAT IS A CLASS TEN!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Drago's challenger lumbers onto the beach, focused on Valka's Bewilderbeast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! Take down the alpha! Valka attacks Drago with her bullhook, trying to stop his commands, but Drago strikes back, knocking her forcefully onto her back. He pins her as she struggles, removing her mask and staff. He's about to finish her off, when WHAM! He's knocked to the ground. He looks up, fuming, to see Stoick helping Valka to her feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For you, my dear... anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 74. As Drago gathers his weapon and drops his heavy cloak, circling Stoick, Drago's Bewilderbeast confronts Valka's in a threat display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Val, do you think you can stop them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll do my best! Come on, Cloudjumper! Valka cuts the nets away and hops onto Cloudjumper, flying off toward the Bewilderbeasts as they charge each other,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Drago LUNGES at Stoick, SWIPING his bullhook.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You... I watched you burn! The two imposing warriors CLASH WEAPONS, SLASHING and LANDING PUNCHES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It takes more than a little fire to kill me! Valka flies between the Bewilderbeasts, waving her staff commandingly, but to no effect.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Drago hooks and yanks the axe out of Stoick's hands. Gobber flies by and HURLS his mace attachment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stoick! Stoick catches it and lands a direct hit on Drago. But, with a devastating SWIPE, DRAGO's Bewilderbeast takes down Valka's, plunging in its tusks and burying its opponent's lifeless body under an avalanche.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Hiccup and the others watch in horror as dragons everywhere land and bow their heads in acknowledgement of the new alpha - - DRAGO'S ALPHA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've won.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 75. Drago points his bullhook toward Valka and Cloudjumper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now finish her! Stoick whirls around, spotting Valka and Cloudjumper in the alpha's sights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Drago's Bewilderbeast INHALES... and BLASTS! Valka steers Cloudjumper out of the way, but ice HITS his tail, causing them to SPIRAL out of control toward the icy spires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on! He LEAPS onto Skullcrusher, spurring him into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Skullcrusher, go! Come on, Gobber! Stoick tosses the mace back to Gobber in passing, who follows brazenly, waving it aloft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right behind ya, Stoick!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 2000 - Stoick's Sacrifice) With his tail impaired, Cloudjumper struggles against a throng of oncoming dragons. Valka is knocked off, but manages to cling to her dragon's neck. As she loses her grip and FALLS... Stoick LEAPS from Skullcrusher and CATCHES Valka. He sinks his axe into an icy column, and they slide to a safe landing. Drago's Bewilderbeast presses closer, sniffing them out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: spotting Drago on the battlefield, commanding the Bewilderbeast to finish the job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Stop! Hiccup lands Toothless a few paces from Drago and brazenly removes his helmet. Drago eyes him, incredulous, then begins to CHUCKLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 76.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This... is the great dragon master? The son of Stoick the Vast? What shame he must feel. Toothless snarls, ready to blast, but Hiccup calms him with a hand gesture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All of this loss, and for what? To become unstoppable? To rule the world? Drago smirks and turns away from Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragons are kind, amazing creatures that can bring people together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or tear them apart. Drago LAUGHS mockingly, then removes his FALSE ARM, revealing a stump at his shoulder. Hiccup is taken aback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see, I know what it is to live in fear. To see my village burned, my family taken. He reattaches the prosthesis, circling Hiccup menacingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But even as a boy, left with nothing, I vowed to rise above the fear of dragons and liberate the people of this world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then why a dragon army?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grinning, smug) Well, you need dragons to conquer other dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or maybe you need dragons to conquer people. (BEAT) To control those who follow you... and to get rid of those who won't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 77.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clever boy. Drago grabs his bullhook and re-approaches Hiccup. Toothless readies himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The world wants peace. And we have the answer, back on Berk. Just let me show you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Let ME show YOU. Drago SHRIEKS madly, summoning the Bewilderbeast. Toothless circles Hiccup, protectively.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: about to blast Stoick and Valka. It hears Drago's distant wails, and approaches obediently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What...? Stoick follows its stare to the distant battlefield below. He spots Hiccup and Toothless a few paces from Drago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup! He rushes off. Valka follows, racing past Gobber as he finally joins them, winded from having run up the mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Gobber!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, change of plans. He hurries back down the mountain after them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: jabbing his bullhook into the ground commandingly. The Bewilderbeast flinches and stops, submissive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No dragon can resist the alpha's command. So he who controls the alpha, controls them all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 78. Drago points to Toothless. The Bewilderbeast stares and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: forcing Toothless to cower under a hypnotic ultrasonic broadcast. Toothless struggles against the alpha's command, writhing and grinding his head against the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless? You okay, bud? What's going on? Toothless fights the command, shaking his head in protest. The Bewilderbeast insists, with a mesmerizing glare and a low, throaty grumble... until Toothless finally succumbs to its control. He raises his head, his stare vacant and robotic, as his pupils turn to slits. Drago then points to Hiccup. The Bewilderbeast responds,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: again at Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Witness true strength. The strength of will over others. In the face of it, you are nothing. Toothless slowly turns to face Hiccup. Advancing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, what did he just tell you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bounding across the ice, pushing himself to make it to Hiccup in time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless, what's the matter with you? What're you doing? Hiccup is backed against fallen ice, with Toothless advancing mindlessly, and nowhere to run. Toothless opens his yawning mouth. Gas seeps from his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Knock it off! Stop! Snap out of it! Stoick barrels through ice formations and over war machines, racing against time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless! No! Toothless! Don't!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 79.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiccup!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Hiccup sees Stoick about to run into the fray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! NO! Toothless BLASTS. Stoick leaps in front of it, shoving Hiccup out of the way and absorbing the blast in the process. He's thrown against the ice with great impact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hearing the blast, horrified. Drago glances back, seeing Stoick laying lifeless in the aftermath, pleased by the sudden turn of events. He shuffles off, satisfied. Stunned, Hiccup comes to and sees Stoick in the rubble. He rushes past the still-entranced Toothless, straining to scatter the ice boulders on top of Stoick's body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad! Valka arrives, winded and aghast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stoick... She helps Hiccup to turn Stoick's body over. Valka presses her ear to Stoick's heart, confirming his death with a mere glance to Hiccup. He tears up, overwhelmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... you... Gobber, Astrid, Eret, and the Gang arrive, slack-jawed. Satisfied, the Bewilderbeast turns away, releasing Toothless of the trance-like state. Toothless blinks, coming to and confused. He approaches the group, sniffing Stoick's hand. Hiccup SHOVES him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Get away from him!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 80. Toothless recoils, innocently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: GO ON! GET OUT OF HERE! GET AWAY! Toothless retreats like a scolded dog, ear plates back and head hung low. Valka watches, broken-hearted, as Hiccup falls upon Stoick, inconsolable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not his fault. You know that. On the battlefield, the alpha BELLOWS, calling all of the dragons to gather. Meatlug, Stormfly, Hookfang and the others all follow the command as the Gang calls after them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) (CONT'D) Good dragons under the control of bad people do bad things. Drago notices Toothless tumble down a snow-bank, once again slit-eyed and entranced, but unable to fly to the alpha without a rider. Drago pins him down, eyeing the saddle, pedals, and prosthetic tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and VALKA In tears as Toothless rises into view, with Drago in the saddle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! His soldiers cheer in the thousands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless! Hiccup tries to go after Toothless, but Valka holds him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, don't! Drago JABS his bull hook and points toward the horizon. The alpha BELLOWS, commanding an exodus as it leads the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move out! Hiccup watches, powerless as all dragons TAKE WING and follow.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: DRAGO GATHER THE MEN AND MEET AT BERK

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 81.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 2100 - Viking Funeral)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: grinds against the shoreline pebbles as a listing, battered ship is pushed into the still iceberg-filled lagoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) May the Valkyries welcome you, and lead you through Odin's great battlefield. May they sing your name with love and fury, so that we might hear it rise from the heights of Valhalla... and know that you've taken your rightful place at the table of kings. Bows and pitch-dipped arrows are gathered from the battlefield. Gobber hands a set to Hiccup, meeting his eyes with sympathetic glance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) For a great man has fallen. A warrior. A chieftain. A father. A friend. Hiccup dips his arrowhead in a smoldering chunk of wreckage, igniting the pitch that coats the tip. He releases his arrow, which sails through the air and lands on the deck of the ship, where Stoick is laid out on a pyre, covered by a sail, his axe upon his chest. The others follow Hiccup's lead. They DRAW BACK in unison and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: their arrows, filling the sky with crisscrossing, flaming streaks. They arc over the lagoon and set the ship alight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fighting back emotion and losing the battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, Dad. He eyes the engulfed ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not the chief that you wanted me to be. And I'm not peacekeeper I thought I was. I don't know... Valka watches him, her heart breaking. She steps forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 82.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You came early into this world. You were such a wee thing. So frail, so fragile. I feared you wouldn't make it. Hiccup lowers his eyes, but Valka lifts his chin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But your father... he never doubted. He always said you'd become the strongest of them all. (BEAT) And he was right. (BEAT) You have the heart of a chief and the soul of a dragon. Only you can bring our worlds together. That is who you are, son. Hiccup meets her bolstering stare. He turns to the ship and watches it in silence, silhouetted in its glow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was so afraid of becoming my dad. Mostly because I thought I never could. How do you become someone that great? That brave? That selfless? (BEAT) I guess you can only try. (to the others) A chief protects his own. We're going back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, with what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He took all the dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not all of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 2200 - Hatchlings to the Rescue)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! WHOOSH! WHOOSH! JUVENILES BLUR past, like flying raptors, ZIGZAGGING wildly. Riding bareback, Hiccup & Co. HURTLE through the narrow ICE CHANNELS -- created by massive splits in the iceberg shelves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 83.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fly straight!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to die!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't fly these things!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, no kidding! Fishlegs barrels into a snow bank, sending several chunks right into Eret's face as rides inverted and HOLLERING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But won't that Bewilderbeast just take control of these guys, too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're babies. They don't listen to anyone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, just like us! Gobber follows up the rear clumsily, STRUGGLING for control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This... is... very dangerous! He PULLS ALONGSIDE Hiccup and Valka.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some might suggest this is poorly conceived.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's a good thing that I never listen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: up at them. They're going to CRASH. Hiccup ROUNDS one side of it, and Gobber flies down the other side. They shout through gaps in the iceberg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what IS your plan?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get Toothless back and kick Drago's- He's interrupted by another closure in the gaps of ice. They blast out of the other side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 84.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heads up! They SPLIT to avoid another peak and then reconvene, only to find another icy outcropping directly in their path.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that thing. Gobber HITS it, with a THUD and a YELP.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 2450 - Hiccup Vs. Toothless) Torches burn in their braziers as Berk slumbers... until the Bewilderbeast approaches, STOMPING down on the monolithic Viking statues that guard the harbor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sound of destruction rouses a flock of Terrible Terrors and Gothi, who was sleeping under the dragons. Their pupils turn to slits, and heeding the ultrasonic call, they fly off. Gothi shuffles onto her deck, confused, then GASPS at horrifying sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gronckle lounges peacefully by the fire, as his Viking owner lavishes him with scratches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, that's a good boy! The Gronckle's eyes suddenly turn to slits and it, too, takes wing, knocking over a chair and table as it heads for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch the furniture! Where are you going? It barrels out of the hut and into the night sky as the Viking rushes to the doorway, spotting the same arresting sight with a gasp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 85.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vikings pour out of the Great Hall as all of Berk's dragons fill the night sky and join the ranks of Drago's growing
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Bewilderbeast rises out of the sea, bearing down on the people of Berk as Drago hovers on Toothless, leading the charge. The Vikings stare, aghast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your chief is dead. Waves of shock and whispers of "Stoick?" spread through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one can protect you now. He thrusts his bull-hook, commanding the Bewilderbeast to fire. The Vikings watch in horror as the Bewilderbeast opens its yawning jaws and BLASTS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragon roars grow louder as Hiccup & Co. approach through clouds, racing against time. They collectively GASP at the sight of Drago's Bewilderbeast having now covered most of the village in explosions of ice. Berk's now commandeered dragons circle in a huddle behind him, joining Valka's flock, and corralled by Drago's armored dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He took all the dragons!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Distract the alpha. Try to keep his focus off of Toothless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... how?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you forgotten who you're riding with? He brazenly aims his baby dragon toward the Bewilderbeast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 86.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There isn't a dragon alive that I can't wrangle! His baby dragon dives toward the sea instead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Except for this one!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Amateur. The others shrug and follow. As they get closer, the Bewilderbeast looms bigger and BIGGER. Berk's Vikings in hiding notice Hiccup and the others as they approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, it's Hiccup! The Vikings CHEER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: surprised to see Hiccup and the others approaching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? With an irate HUFF, the Bewilderbeast focuses on Hiccup, gaining ever closer to Toothless. Suddenly, a SHEEP appears in its sight, rising and falling out of view. The Bewilderbeast blinks, confused. It looks down to see Eret catching the falling sheep and reloading it into the game launcher, as Tuffnut cocks the mechanism and Ruffnut pulls the trigger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep `em coming! Snotlout tosses the black sheep to Tuffnut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Black sheep, baby! Exasperated, the alpha inhales, about to blast, when... HONK! The game horn blares, breaking his concentration. He turns, finding the horn unmanned. The Bewilderbeast then returns his focus to the sheep launcher, until the BLACK SHEEP LANDS on the his face, bouncing down his facial spines and becoming lodged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 87.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ten points! The Bewilderbeast shakes the black sheep off and prepares to blast again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-oh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The alpha whips around -- still no one at the horn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: giggling and hiding behind the game horn. The Bewilderbeast finally lets loose the ice blast, covering the entire horn in jagged spikes... as Fishlegs leaps from the platform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm okay!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as he reaches Drago, hovering directly in Toothless' sights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You certainly are hard to get rid of. I'll say that. Hiccup ignored him and focuses on Toothless' slitted pupils.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless? It's me, bud. It's me. I'm right here. Come back to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Hiccup appears as an unfamiliar red blur, still firmly under the control of the Bewilderbeast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is not yours anymore. He belongs to the alpha! Drago smugly sits back in the saddle, his arms open in invitation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But, please, oh great dragon master, try to take him. He will not miss a second time. Hiccup holds strong, maintaining eye contact with Toothless. He reaches out to touch him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 88.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't your fault, bud. They made you do it. Drago's amusement fades as Toothless stirs. His pupils
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: then NARROW again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'd never hurt him. (BEAT) You'd never hurt me. Drago watches, amazed, as Toothless fights the control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How are you doing that? Hiccup holds the stare, tears in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please. You are my best friend, bud. Bewilderbeast ROARS a forceful command.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My best friend. Toothless' pupils jitter, then DILATE fully. He coos sympathetically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thatta boy! That's it! I'm here! Toothless' eyes finally dilate fully and resolve on Hiccup's familiar face. Drago goes from astounded to alarmed. Drago STRIKES Toothless with the bull hook in a vain attempt to regain control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Toothless ROARS defiantly, snatches the bull hook in his jaws, and PULLS... yanking Drago off of his back and sending him both PLUMMETING to the sea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! But without a rider, Toothless drops out of the sky as well. Hiccup leaps from the baby dragon, diving after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 89.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on! Drago breaks his fall, landing heavily upon the Bewilderbeast's tusk... As Hiccup tucks in his arms, trying to close the gap between he and Toothless before they both make impact with the ocean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Almost there, buddy. Almost there! Hiccup reaches Toothless. They pair up, mid-air, and skyrocket past Drago as he hobbles to the top of the alpha's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 2500 - One True Alpha) Hiccup looks back at Drago, now issuing commands from the top of the Bewilderbeast's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do something!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need to get those two apart. Hiccup flies Toothless past a flag pole tears a strip of the flag. The Bewilderbeast BLASTS in their direction, barely missing them as they disappear around the back of a mountain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We gotta block him out, Toothless. Do you trust me, bud? Toothless coos, allowing Hiccup to BLINDFOLD him with the flag. Hiccup calms him with a touch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can do this. You and me. As one. Hiccup SPLAYS Toothless' mechanical tail. Toothless responds,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the move with the natural half.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it. Now let's try this one more time!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 90. They PEEL around the other side of the mountain, heading back toward Drago and Bewilderbeast, passing Astrid and the cheering Vikings on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take them down, babe! The Viking roar in support as Hiccup and Toothless race past. Valka watches with pride as her son hurtles towards Drago and the alpha.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go get `em.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take control of it! The Bewilderbeast's HISS becomes a furious ROAR, but to no avail. Hiccup clamps his hands over Toothless' ear plates, muffling the alpha's commands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut it out, Toothless!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Bewilderbeast BLASTS!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Toothless suddenly PULLS UP, ARCING over Drago's head! Drago
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: victorious, then pauses in shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : as Toothless climbs inverted through the sky, the blindfold falls free, revealing an EMPTY SADDLE. Drago WHIRLS around, wide-eyed, to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ING TOWARD HIM, his wing-suit deployed, and his Dragon Blade trailing Zippleback gas. Drago SWIPES but misses him. Hiccup clicks the lighter and ignites the gas, blasting Drago off his Bewilderbeast with a SCREAM. Drago PLUMMETS, BREAKING HIS FALL against the massive dragon's spines and landing hard on the ground, his bullhook landing just out of reach. The Bewilderbeast WHIPS its tail, trying to SWAT down Hiccup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 91.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not again. (BEAT)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! IT'S NOW OR NEVER! Toothless pops open his dorsal blades, arcs skyward, and rejoins Hiccup just before colliding with the alpha's tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, bud! Together again, they speed along the length of the thrashing tail...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on! And shoot past the tip of the tail, narrowly making it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! We did it! They arc through the sky and LAND a few paces from Drago, kicking up a trail of dust. Battered and weary, Drago reaches for his bullhook. Hiccup extends and fires up his Dragon Blade, hurling it like a javelin, and sticking it in the ground between Drago and his weapon, singeing his outstretched hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agghh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold him there Toothless! Toothless SNARLS a warning, ready to blast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's all over now. But the cloud of dust settles, revealing the Bewilderbeast, rising behind Hiccup, ready to blast him instead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or is it? Hiccup spins around, alarmed, as a RUSH of water THUNDERS up the Bewilderbeast's throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, no!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 92. It BLASTS, but Toothless leaps into the way, shielding Hiccup beneath him. The freezing explosion envelops them both. Drago laughs to himself as Valka lands her baby dragon and rushes to the icy explosion, hammering away at it desperately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! No...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and GOBBER, watching from a distance, horrified. As Valka POUNDS at the ice, a GLOWS forms from deep within. She realizes what is about to happen and backs away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: thunders from inside the ice, SHATTERING it. Toothless emerges from the debris, revealing Hiccup curled safely under his wings. Toothless is steaming, his black skin glowing blue with rage, his split dorsal blades searing with blue heat, a glow emanating from his flared nostrils. He turns back to Hiccup, to check if he's unharmed, then turns his full attention back to the Bewilderbeast. He leaps out of the crater and lands upon an ice spire, roaring ferociously. The Bewilderbeast bellows back at this affront. Toothless unleashes a salvo of plasma into the Bewilderbeast's face, not letting up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's challenging the alpha!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To protect you. The Bewilderbeast ROARS at this act of insubordination. Toothless fires back, time and again, fully in control. The alpha thrashes his tusks through the ice, trying to smash Toothless, but he deftly spring from spire to spire, continuing his unrelenting attack. In the midst of the mayhem, the horde of commandeered dragons
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: both Berk's and Valka's -- break free from the control to witness Toothless' retaliation. Toothless lands protectively by Hiccup and Valka, commanding the dragons to shift sides. The follow, amassing behind Toothless. Seeing this, Drago panics and rushes toward the Bewilderbeast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 93.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no, no! Fight back! Fight!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Drago clambers up the Bewilderbeast's tusk, totally unhinged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the defecting dragons) What's the matter with you? The Berkians swell in to show their unified support. Drago fumes as Hiccup and Toothless fly up together onto an ice spire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now do you get it? This is what it is to earn a dragon's loyalty. (BEAT) Let this end now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never! Come on! He hammers the Bewilderbeast, spurring it into a charge. Toothless calls over his shoulder, commanding the dragons to ready themselves. He then BLASTS the Bewilderbeast, mid- charge. Suddenly, Skullcrusher fires. Followed by another, and another. Hiccup looks around, amazed to see the flock of dragons opening fire on Drago and his Bewilderbeast. They've started a rebellion. Drago is forced to hide from the fiery barrage by taking cover in the tall spines of the giant's crown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: FIGHT! BLAST THEM! His prosthetic arm is blasted clean off by one of his own armored dragons. The Bewilderbeast rears back to cover them all in ice, but Toothless lets loose a powerful shot. The Bewilderbeast's head is KNOCKED backward by a blue-flame fireball. As the smoke clears, one of its massive TUSKS FALLS to the ground, sheared clean off. Drago glares at Toothless. Toothless ROARS commandingly, calling an end to the fight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The alpha protects them all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 94. Overwhelmed and overpowered, the Bewilderbeast yields to the new alpha and heeds Toothless' command, retreating into the sea in an explosive splash. The Berkians CHEER in victory! As the smoke clears, Hiccup and Toothless see nothing but bubbles on the waves to mark their disappearance. No sign of the Bewilderbeast... or Drago. Toothless hops down from the spire, cooling off, as people celebrate all around them. All of the dragons -- Berk's, Valka's, even Drago's -- land around Toothless. Cloudjumper bows to Toothless, starting a wave of bows, acknowledging their new alpha. Toothless looks around, surprised, then lets out a majestic
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The assembled dragons join in, roaring in tribute. Toothless turns to Hiccup as he approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You never cease to amaze me, bud. Thank you. Toothless GURGLES and licks Hiccup's face. Hiccups squeals, trying to get away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Toothless! You know that doesn't wash out. The crowd laughs. All around them, Berk's dragons reunite with their Vikings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stormfly! Stormfly bounds into Astrid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, give me a cuddle, Grumpy! Grump lands ON TOP of Gobber, flattening him. Relieved to the point of tears, Snotlout and Fishlegs race towards the expectant Ruffnut...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's my little princess? ... and then right PAST her to embrace their dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 95.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I missed you so much!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you ever leave again, Hookfang! Ruffnut GRUMBLES, dejected. Barf dips his head in to console her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh Barf! She hugs him. Belch looms in for some affection, but Ruffnut pushes him away...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not you. And into Tuffnut who glowers back at her. Hiccup smiles, taking in the happy reunions. Skullcrusher approaches him, without an owner to reunite with. Hiccup pets him, as Eret approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was some pretty fine dragon wrangling back there. You'd make a good trapper. Before Hiccup can respond, Skullcrusher nuzzles Eret affectionately. Eret chuckles and gently strokes him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Y'know, Skullcrusher's gonna need somebody to look after him now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me? Hiccup nods reassuringly. Eret looks at Skullcrusher, pausing to consider it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd be honored. Valka walks up to her son, bursting with pride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your father... he'd be every bit as proud as I am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 96.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. I'm really glad you're here, Mom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And here I'll stay. Toothless arrives, purring at Valka's touch as Astrid strides toward Hiccup, beaming proudly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See? I told you it was in here. She places her hand upon his chest, then quickly pokes the dorsal fin button, popping it open. She GIGGLES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha, ha. Still doing that one? That's hilarious. (THEN) Come here, you. He scoops Astrid close and pulls her into a kiss. Gobber covers a gawking boy's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh. Gothi, the elder, taps Hiccup's shoulder, interrupting the romantic moment. She gestures for Hiccup to kneel. He does so, respectfully. Using ash from a heap of burnt wreckage, Gothi traces a Viking symbol onto Hiccup's forehead. She bows. Hiccup stands, meeting Gobber's proud, smiling eyes. Gobber turns to the silent crowd and throws up his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The chief has come home! The Berkians erupt with cheers and applause as Hiccup takes in the moment, acknowledging the weight of responsibility now upon him. Toothless throws back his head and BLASTS in celebration, spurring all other dragons to follow suit, lighting up the sky in a spectacular display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (Scene 2700 - A New Beginning)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 97. A sheep grazes lazily on the grass as a Terrible Terror struggles in vain to carry him off. Suddenly, both are snatched up by a passing dragon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ruffnut and Tuffnut wrestle over the sheep atop Barf & Belch. Ruffnut send the sheep flying toward Fishlegs. Snotlout nabs it instead, blowing a kiss mockingly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) This... is Berk. A bit trampled and busted and covered in ice, but it's home. It's our home. They swoop past a gathered crowd on the battered bleachers as Snotlout dunks the sheep in his basket. Eret joins the race atop Skullcrusher. They fly past Hiccup and Toothless, who are steadily hoisting a palette of timber and supplies onto a rooftop where workers are rebuilding the damaged houses. Hiccup then turns his attention to a massive statue of Stoick, presently under construction. He grins with pride.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Those who attacked us are relentless and crazy. But those who stopped them? Oh, even more so! He looks to the horizon, scanning it from east to west to ensure that no trouble is approaching. Astrid and Stormfly buzz past him playfully, coaxing him to join the game. He smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) We may be small in numbers, but we stand for something bigger than anything the world can pit against us. Astrid soars past the blacksmith stall, waving to Valka and Gobber as they remove the armor from Drago's freed battle dragons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) We are the voice of peace. And bit by bit, we will change this world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 98. Realizing that he's late, Gobber hurries over to the sheep launcher and pulls the trigger, sending the black sheep hurtling into the air. Astrid and Stormfly close in on the black sheep, about to snatch it out of the air, when suddenly, Hiccup and Toothless dart past, beating them to it. Toothless looks back with a gummy smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) You see, we have something they don't. Oh sure, they have armies and they have armadas... Toothless and Hiccup dive toward the line of baskets. As they approach, Toothless bounces Hiccup into the air, allowing him to dunk the black sheep into Astrid's basket. They reunite on the other side. The crowd cheers!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) But we... we have... Hiccup and Toothless land upon the chief's dais, joined by Astrid, Stormfly, and the other dragon riders.
direction.name: direction
